000.title: File '/testfile' exist
000.descr: File named 'testfile' exist in the root folder on system.
000.prescription: This is a test, you don't have to do something.

001.title: Database 'test_db' exist
001.descr: Database 'test_db' exist on system and has not empty table test_table.
001.prescription: This is a test, you don't have to do something.

002.title: File permissions checking
002.prescription: You should set right permissions using command 'chmod'.

003.title: Cisco memory dump analysis
003.descr: Attempt to find credentials in memory dump.

004.title: Checking database version
004.descr: Checking the relevance of the database version.

005.title: Mysqld euser checking
005.descr: Checking user who runned mysqld is mysql.
005.req: Mysql-daemon is running as user mysql
005.prescription: You should run mysqld as mysql

006.title: MySQL config checking
006.descr: Checking that password option don't used in global configuration file.
006.prescription: You should disable this option and remove password from config file.

007.title: MySQL passwords checking
007.descr: Checking that MySQL users do not use weak passwords like username or 'pwd123'.

008.title: MySQL tables privilege
008.descr: Checking that the table is given privileges only to users from whitelist.
008.req: The table is given privileges only to users from whitelist

009.title: Timeouts checking
009.descr: Checking that console timeout <= 10 minutes. Checking that ssh timeout <= 10 minutes
009.prescription: Run commands: console timeout {<= 10 minutes}, ssh timeout {<= 10 minutes}
